name: NeoDefense: Tower Defense
summary: neoDefense is a defense game set in a core of new life invaded by countless creeps. A game that is a new twist of tower defense games, something that will keep you hooked and intriguingly challenged! Build your fortress any way you wish, upgrade weapons and let the invasions begin! And sweep them! Don’t go over yourself & think that you can always win – strategize! This game need your brilliant idea to defeat enemies attack! Each mission has its own mind-challenging hardness, show that your enemies can never outsmart you. Use weapons, plan and destroy the invaders.
